error.notallowed: Audio is not allowed. Please check browser settings and web page permissions.
error.notfound: No compatible audio input device was found.
error.realtime: Audio conversation failed on an error.

audio.initializingRecording: Initializing audio recording. Please permit audio access to use speech recognition.
audio.recording: I'm listening to your speech. Stop by taking a break or by pressing the button.

error.connection: Failed to connect to the AI assistant.
error.limit: The message was blocked due to chat usage limits.
error.moderation: The message was blocked due to content.
